title: Mei King
synopsis: Cain Asbell was an unremarkable guy until he rescued Princess Charlotte. He goes from pauper to Lord, but there's a catch. Cain has to make his land the most prosperous in the country within 5 years. If he fails, he'll lose everything. But if he succeeds, Cain will gain the Princess Charlotte's hand in marriage.
staff: [['Murakami, Teruaki', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Key Animation', ' Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Yoshida, Tomohiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Nishi, Shigenari', ['Editing']], ['Iida, Hiroyoshi', ['Key Animation']]]
